idea: Dispensing unit with its constituents/assemblies as flow meters, digital display, electronic panel, valves, circuit boards, gauges for measuring temperature, pressure and volume/quantity, tempering protection systems, keyboards, switches, relays, motor controllers and enclosures. Also electrical and mechanical controls, actuators, Hoses, computers and motors, assemblies, printers, modems, routers employed for measurement of volume/quantity/multi product delivery/monetary value of dispensed liquid/gas as per rates, classified under class 9.  Preselecting and controlling deliveries of fuels of the selected liquid/gas, remotely recording the measurements pertaining to cost and volume/quantity of dispensed liquid/gases, Multiproduct delivery provisions, its pressure and temperature.
name: CZAR METRIC SYSTEM PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Magic @ Home was incepted in 2012. It is a company that manufactures and deals in household insecticides. We provide solutions for uninvited visitors such as rats, lizards, cockroaches or mosquitos.

At Magic, we provide various exceedingly effective and affordable solutions in form of household cleaning and repellents.

Each of our products has been designed with utmost care and a strong scientific background, with years of research and development.


Moreover, we aim towards making our products non toxic to both humans and the pests.
name: Magic @ Home

idea:
I was started my firm in Sept 1914, as channel partner of idea cellular limited


After the jio launched my office has slowly got into the loss üòî,

Now I am going to start garage of four wheeler with partnership.


Can I get any help from government..?

I am not expecting money, I need guidance to make this business profitable.
name: IICE

idea: By using cutting edge technology, Firstventure offers solutions to automate and track the delivery of training programs of all shapes and sizes. We also help enterprises reduce their training costs by recommending impact-specific courses and suggest ways to enhance training ROI, resulting in learning-led business growth. With the launch of our mobile application, Courseplay Mobile, we have added value to the lives of over 150,000 learners around the world in sectors ranging from aviation to logistics to retail.
name: FIRSTVENTURE CORPORATION PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Company is in acquiring business i.e acquiring merchants across India for installing Quick response (QR) Code for acceptance of payments vide Credit Card/ Debit Card/Net Banking/ UPI/multiple Wallets.
name: PYMNTS TECH SOLUTION PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
About Pathbreaker Skill Enterprises
Pathbreaker Skill enterprise has been recently incorporated as a LLP company with registered office in Pune. The company prides itself as a social enterprise striving to transform the Human Capital to Skilled Asset. To realise this vision the company is focussed on four verticals :-
     * Employability Skill Development for Youth.
     * Teacher to Mentor Facilitation.
     *  Shaping the Core (life) Skills of Students.
     *  Force Multiplier Training for the Brown Collared.
name: Pathbreaker Skill Enterprises

idea: JumpStream Technologies aims to make digital content universally accessible. Our flagship product JumpToTV (device + app) supersizes or jumps content from smartphones to TVs (CRTs included) without needing wired broadband or WiFi.  The app ensures a one-tap connect and also enables discovery of new content across video streaming apps.
name: JumpStream Technologies

idea:
To carry on the business of manufacturers, producers, exhibitors, financers,
importers, exporters, and distributors, dubbing of cinematographic films, Television
films, and pictures, both talkies and silent and in particular to produce, prepare,
manufacture, photograph, present, represent, buy, sell, deal with, dispose off,

topical, international documentary, any and every kind of variety of subjects and to

books, posters, hoardings and broachers and to setup acting schools and produce

name: CINEYUG INTERNATIONAL ENTERTAINMENT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Suprstart Ventures LLP is a young and energetic company specializing in Website designing, Mobile Applications development, Digital marketing and Promo video creation for each and every industry. We are based in Mumbai (India). 

We have Start-up packages for budding Entrepreneurs looking to transform their ideas into reality. With our compliance and tech packages Entrepreneurs can now solely focus on their core business expertise and leave the rest on us.
name: SUPRSTART VENTURES LLP

idea:
MAAVishwant Engineering Pvt.Ltd (MVEPL) MAAVishwant Engineering Pvt.Ltd (MVEPL) is an ISO 9001:2015 Certified Company. We are the Manufacturer & Trader and Service Provider of Dredger, Dredger Pump, Dredging Service, De-Watering Pump, Barges, Boat,River Cleaning Pump etc. MVEPL largely produce Heavy Duty Suction Pump for Construction & Mining Industries.

MVEPL is established with a Vision to ‚ÄúLets Solve the Water‚Äù, We provide a "Complete Marine solutions" under one roof. Therefore we provide wide range of mining De-watering pumps, Sludge Pump, Slurry Pump, River cleaning machine, Sand Mining Machines, and Dredger for Sand Mining, River Dredging, Island Creation, Lake Dredging, etc
We understand how critical mine dewatering is, that is why we offer large line of heavy- duty cast- iron pumps built to withstand the element each equipped with a reliable priming system. MVEPL provide the high volume and solid handling capabilities required to help keep mines running efficiently.
We are here to provide unparalleled services to our clients. We offer dredging and land reclamation services including operation and maintenance of portable dredgers. Backed by an enthusiastic team of qualified experts, we aim to establish ourselves in the private sector as a major dredging company.
name: MAAVISHWANT ENGINEERING PRIVATE LIMITED
